alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Doniphan; Leavenworth (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 27 at 1:26AM CST until February 27 at 1:45AM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN DONIPHAN...NORTH CENTRAL LEAVENWORTH...SOUTHEASTERN ATCHISON...BUCHANAN...SOUTHEASTERN HOLT...NORTHWESTERN PLATTE AND WESTERN ANDREW COUNTIES... At 125 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Fillmore to Elwood to near Easton, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... St. Joseph, Leavenworth, Savannah, Platte City, Weston, Wathena, Elwood, Troy, Country Club Villa, Country Club, Agency, Dearborn, Camden Point, Amazonia, Rushville, Tracy, Fillmore, Lewis And Clark Village, De Kalb and Iatan. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 16 and 71. Interstate 435 between mile markers 29 and 31. Interstate 229 between mile markers 0 and 14. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
